items.sentence: Tom came over to my house for dinner yesterday.
Tom came to the party with a girl half his age.
Thank you for clearing up the misunderstanding.
Thank you for coming all the way to see me off.
That box is too small to hold all these things.
The actor died at the height of his popularity.
The bus Tom was on was involved in an accident.
The doctor advised him to cut back on drinking.
I just wish we could leave this horrible place.
I like the smell of bread just out of the oven.
You shouldn\'t have gone into the forest alone.
Can you tell me where I can find a guest house?
How many Christmas cards did you get last year?
Go wake Tom up and tell him breakfast is ready.
Have you ever seen something this funny before?
Have you made up your mind to become a teacher?
Tom is the head chef at a restaurant in Boston.
Tom is the last person I want to see right now.
Tom is the one who told me about what happened.
Tom is the only Canadian I invited to my party.
Tom is the only one here that can speak French.
Tom told me that he\'d like to become a doctor.
Tom wasn\'t used to having someone wait on him.
I\'ve attached the document that you requested.
It\'s been almost 30 years since the war ended.
Tom already knows I\'m not very happy about it.
Tom already knows where he\'s going to do that.
Can you tell me how to get to the Hilton Hotel?
Can you tell me how you found out what Tom did?
Can you verify that this message came from Tom?
Chances are that he has not heard the news yet.
Did the accommodations meet with your approval?
Tom told me that you\'ve been to Boston before.
Mary dated Tom\'s brother before she dated him.
The hostages will be released before Christmas.
The last I heard, Tom was fishing up in Canada.
The last time I saw Tom he was eating an apple.
The man reading a book over there is my father.
You don\'t have to tell the truth all the time.
You don\'t seem to realize how serious this is.
You don\'t usually do that by yourself, do you?
Tom and Mary weren\'t invited to John\'s party.
Is it too much to hope that you\'ll forgive me?
It looks like you\'re not having much fun here.
We don\'t have enough money now, unfortunately.
We don\'t have time to look for that right now.
We don\'t know for sure Tom is still in Boston.
Tom hasn\'t been able to contact Mary by phone.
Tom hasn\'t yet told us what he wants us to do.
Tom and Mary built a snow fort in the backyard.
